attributes.action: Public access to the means of evidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'Non serious' crime - is malignant to the communities in which it takes place.It is often those victims with the greatest need to gather court-standard evidence, who have least access to the means of gathering it.  We petition the Prime Minister to place greater investment in publicly available CCTV, sound recording equipment and police forensic support to gather court standard evidence, to bring such crime before the correct authorities.
